text: Ki tusim nahim vekhade, ki jihare akasam ate dharati vica hana, uha sabha alaha nu hi sijada karade hana. Ate suraja, cana, tare, pahara, rukha ate bahuta sare inasana vi. Ate bahuta sare ajihe hana jinham upara saza sabita ho cuki hai ate jisanu alaha be'izata kara deve, tam usanu roti ijata bakhasana vala nahim. Nirasadeha alaha jo cahuda hai, uha kara dida hai
